FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

) AS s

SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s

    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"

LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"

    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")

2025-06-25 19:52:27.420 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

2025-06-25 21:30:53.579 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (14ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"

) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail"
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"
